# Ignore .env files (environment variables)
venv/
.env/
*.env
**/.env

# Python related files
__pycache__/
*.py[cod]
*.sqlite3

# Logs
*.log
*.txt

# Virtual environment folder
venv/
env/

# Django database
db.sqlite3
db.sqlite3-journal

# Static and Media files (Django's generated files)
static/
media/

# React / Node related files
node_modules/
build/
dist/

# Ignore temporary files
*.bak
*.tmp
*~

# Editor files
.vscode/
.idea/
*.swp

# OS-specific files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db
desktop.ini

# Git ignore for backups or local configurations
*.backup
*.old

# Ignore generated documents (PDFs or others)
medi_doc_server/documents/pdf/
